articles.description: Cerebral venous thrombosis (CVT) is when a blood clot forms in a vein of the brain. This can lead to burst blood vessels that leak into brain tissues.
articles.content:
Cerebral venous thrombosis (CVT) is when a blood clot forms in a vein of the brain. This can lead to blood vessels breaking, causing blood to leak into brain tissues.
